knimeNode.name: Teams
knimeNode.shortDescription: Query team information and statistics from the Football API

intro.p: Queries team information and optionally statistics from the Football API for a specific league and season. Returns team details including name, code, country, founding year, and venue information.
Optionally includes team statistics (requires additional API calls per team): wins, draws, losses, goals for, and goals against.

fullDescription.option: Select the league to query teams for. Populated from reference data input.
Select the season year. Populated from reference data input.
Optional: Select a specific team. Leave blank to get all teams in the league.
Optional: Search for teams by name (partial match supported). Alternative to selecting from dropdown.
Check to include team statistics (wins, draws, losses, goals). Warning: This makes one additional API call per team and may increase execution time.

ports.inPort: API-Sports connection from the API-Connector node
Reference data (leagues, seasons, teams) from the Reference Data Loader node
ports.outPort: Table containing team data with columns: Team_ID, Team_Name, Code, Country, Founded, Venue_Name, Venue_City, Venue_Capacity, Wins, Draws, Losses, Goals_For, Goals_Against
